class_a_05_ecology_01:
Hello, hello. I hope everyone’s ready to learn
some new things today![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_02: You all did really great on the midterm exam![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_03:
Thanks for answering my little question at the
end, too.\c
I’ll be sure to keep your responses in mind.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_04:
All right! We’re now heading into the last half
of our classes together.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_05:
It’s time for our knowledge to evolve and grow—
just like our Pokémon![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_07:
Today we’re going to learn about the fascinating
phenomenon of Pokémon Evolution![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_08:
As your Pokémon battle and level up, they learn
moves and get stronger.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_09:
And for some Pokémon, once they’ve leveled up
enough...[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_10:
their appearance changes, and their stats
increase—sometimes by a lot![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_12:
Pokémon become very strong when they evolve,
making them trusty partners in battle.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_13:
But! Some people prefer to keep their Pokémon
in their adorable pre-evolved states.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_14:
To do this, you just need to remember a certain
button when your Pokémon begins to evolve.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_15:
Say it with me if you already know! To cancel
Evolution, press the...[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_answer_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Huh? Um...[VAR TRNAME(0000)], you may
be\r
thinking\r
of\r
something else.\c
The A Button has more of a decisive feel to it.
Kinda like “A-OK!” don’t you think?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_answer_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Huh? Um...[VAR TRNAME(0000)], you may
be\r
thinking\r
of\r
something else.\c
The C Button... That has a bit of a nostalgic feel
to it, don’t you think?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_16:
The button you want when you need to stop a
Pokémon from evolving is the B Button![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_17:
If you press this button soon after a Pokémon
begins to evolve, you can stop it from changing.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_18:
You can also let the Pokémon hold an item known
as an Everstone to keep it from evolving.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_19:
And keep in mind that the requirements for
Evolution differ from Pokémon to Pokémon.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_20:
Some may evolve by having a certain item, such
as a Fire Stone or Thunder Stone, used on them.\c
Others may have to learn a specific move or
defeat a specific Pokémon in battle to evolve.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_21:
The way Primeape evolves into Annihilape is
especially strange.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_22: You see, there’s a certain move that—[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_23: Whoops. Sorry, looks like we’re out of time![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_05_ecology_24:
I guess we’ll have to end the class there today.
Thank you all for your attention![VAR 0114(002A)]
